affiliation: Director, Open Source Technology Center, Software and Services Group, Intel Corporation
name: Imad Sousou
biography: Imad Sousou is the Director of Intel’s Open Source Technology Center. He manages the group responsible for open source at Intel, including Intel’s work on the MeeGo project (meego.com), Linux enabling across all Intel platforms, and many other key open source software projects including Intel Linux graphics, power management (lesswatts.org), virtualization, and communications (oFono.org and connman.net).
